name: Android
description:
With the role of mobile android leader, I have collaborated with the development, implementation and maintenance of the suite of Santander banking mobile applications for the Android platform, participating in the team responsible for the Santander mobile and Super Wallet development which consisted in meetings, requirements gathering, design and improvement of the responsiveness and performance of the application, as well as the integration of new functionalities such as bank loans, software Token, Santanderâ€™s Plus Rewards Program, facelift, etc. In the Santander and Super Wallet applications I used Android Studio, Android SDK, Java, JSON, SQLite, Material Design, Retrofit, RxJava, Firebase, MVP Architecture, Gemalto and much more and for the Hybrid components I used HTML, JavaScript, CSS and React-Js all this to achieve a high adoption rate and a fast time delivery using Agile Principles and the Scrum framework.

(Read on Wikipedia)
